verses.name: Luke 10:35
verses.text: And on the morrow when he departed, he took out two pence, and gave them to the host, and said unto him, Take care of him; and whatsoever thou spendest more, when I come again, I will repay thee.

verses.name: Luke 10:36
verses.text: Which now of these three, thinkest thou, was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves?

verses.name: Luke 10:37
verses.text: And he said, He that shewed mercy on him. Then said Jesus unto him, Go, and do thou likewise.

verses.name: Luke 10:38
verses.text: Now it came to pass, as they went, that he entered into a certain village: and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house.
